page.title: 17HOME LIFE My Home
page.content: {My Home. My home has eight rooms, three bedrooms,bathroom,hall,kitchen,dining room and a living room.In my room I have a piano,two dressing tables,two wardrobes and a bed.We also have an Acorn Electron computer.Our house is about 18 years old and we are the second people to live in it.It has some patio doors leading into the front garden.We have a gas fire,gas cooker and central heating.We do not have a shower but we do have a bath.In each of the eight rooms there is a radiator.The house is in Churchill Way in the village of Heckington.In the living room we have a television,two chairs, a sofa and a coffee table.Our telephone is not a press button one but my sister and I have a press button intercom.In the garden we grow tomatoes,rhubarb and flowers.
